author: Warren Black
comment: The watch faces they have are mostly decent, some are very well done. The problem is there just isn't enough of them. Not for the price you pay per year. Also, it's taking a very long time for them to fix the coming soon no connection issue. So at the moment, not only are you stuck with a limited number of watch faces to choose from, but there are zero new ones coming in. It's been like this for nearly a month. This app could well be one of the better ones, but still lacks in a lot of areas.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Warren. 
Thank you for the feedback and we are again very sorry for the inconvenience. We are currently aware of the coming soon page issue and will be updating the application soon. Also on your feedback about not enough watchfaces, we will upload more wonderful watchfaces soon! Please wait for us. 
Thank you again and best regards.

author: Jimmy Steiger
comment: Love the watchface designs "the classyness of them" wish they had more of a clickable interface.. I would be giving a 4 Star review if almost every month now it keeps on telling me in no longer pro & asks me to subscribe again... even tho I'm subbed till 10/10/18...? Please fix this issue & I'll up the review

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello there. If you have purchase the subscription from Google you must install the WatchMaster from Google Play store. This goes same for Samsung Galaxy, you must install the WatchMaster from Samsung Galaxy app store. Please delete the current WatchMaster and reinstall it from the app store where you have purchase the subscription.

author: Sunil Kumar
comment: It stopped working with the new tizen 3.0 update. Please fix the issue. I love this app. Thanks for the response. But it doesn't detect my watch..

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello Sunil. Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. Please note we have already fixed the Tizen OS update within WatchMaster. Please delete your current WatchMaster for Gear S2&3 and install it to WatchMaster for Tizen or make sure you have updated the companion application. If needed help :ask.watchmaster@gmail.com.

author: Barry McKinlay
comment: One of the MOST expensive watch face apps and has the FEWEST faces. Totally regret my purchase of $16.99. Basically the same number of faces from 11/2016 (approximately 400). This app is NOT worth the money.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello Barry. Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. Please note we have been updating with new watchfaces before and more will be updated soon. If you have any other issues email us at ask.watchamster@gmail.com. Thanks.

author: Agustinus Huang
comment: Coming soon watch face error conection, please fix it

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Agustinus. 
Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. We are currently aware of this issue and will update the application very soon. Please understand the circumstances and wait for us. If you have any other issues email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. Thank you.

author: kurt royston dos santos
comment: After the last update coming soon watchfaces cannot be seen

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello there! 
Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. 
We are currently aware of the issue and will update the application very soon! 
Please understand the circumstances and wait for us! 
Also new watchfaces will also be updated soon. 
Hope this helped, if not email us. Thank you.

author: Harveet Sehgal
comment: Bring back full subscription.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Harveet. 
Thank you for the feedback we are sorry for the inconvenience. We are still working with the team to bring better solutions and services for the future. Please understand the circumstances and wait for us! If you have any other questions email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. Thank you.

author: Duy Tô
comment: Good

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello there.
Thank you for the feedback and for rating us :).
We hope you tryout our other watchfaces as well. If you have any problems or issues while using our app please email us (tizen.watchmaster@gmail.com) and we will be happy to help you out. Thank you and best regards.

author: Adam Nail
comment: I have been using this app for over a year now, I just tried to apply the N-on watch face from a new designer. It crashed my watch so bad that the app keeps stopping and restarting on my watch. I paid for premium over a year ago and genuinely enjoyed the app but this experience has completely ruined smart watches for me. I tried everything, even re-installing. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello Adam. Thank you for the feedback and we are truly sorry for the inconvenience. We have notify the developing team on this issue. But in order to help you solve this issues, we need information on your device. Please email us the details at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. We will do our best to help you out. Thank you and best regards.

author: Rick L.
comment: This is a great collection of Watchfaces! In my second year of subscription & will continue to subscribe... Quick to catch and fix any problems with their app!  Why did you suspend unlimited subscription? I will gladly pay up too $15.00 a year for unlimited access!!! These are some of the best Watchfaces available!

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello Rick. Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. We will be uploading details of the unlimited subscription soon in our WatchMaster app' notice section. We really thank you for the support! If you have any other questions or issues while using our app email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. Thank you.

author: Bee Banks
comment: I use to love this app. After the most recent update, I am unable to install faces on Gear S2. Extremely disappointed.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello Banks. Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. Please try deleting the WatchMaster for Gear S2 &3 and reinstall it to WatchMaster for Tizen. Also double check your connection status on both phone and watch. If the watchface is still not applying email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. Thanks.

author: Michael Lewis
comment: This simply has the best watch faces you can get on android wear right now, and its so awesome! I love the animated watch faces so much and I love being able to switch the watch faces from my phone. I just wish there were more digital watch faces. I strongly prefer digital to analog. Besides that its an amazing set of watch faces.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Michael.
Thank you for the feedback and for supporting us! :)
We will be requesting more digital watchfaces to our designers and release them as soon as possible. So please stay tuned! If you have any other requests or questions while using our applications please email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. Thank you and best regards.

author: Cedric Yeo
comment: The designs of watch faces within the app is very good and beautiful, but the authentication to login is a hassle. It keeps logging me out saying that there is an authentication failure and when i tried again, it just keeps loading.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Cedric. 
Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. 
Please try to login for few more times . The authentication failure do occur but eventually it will let you login. We are current aware of the issue and will be updated on our next update. Please understand the circumstances. If any questions email us! 
Thank you.

author: Žygimantas Stauga
comment: Watchface doesn't automatically change timezone while traveling. Need to reapply watchface every time. Watch battery doesn't work anymore. Only changes when reapplying watchface.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Žygimantas. 
Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. We currently don't have the feature you are referring to, but we will meet with the team and discuss upon your request. For now you must manually change the timezone. Hope this helped, if not email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. 
Thank you and best regards.

author: Richard Stewart
comment: I would give a five star rating if I knew how to remove notification icon for watchmaker on android zte quartz  (the little gray and white bell) 🔔 on the watch display

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Richard. 
Thank you for the feedback. Please note this is WatchMaster not WatchMaker. Also the push notification can be manageable from Settings. Hope this helped, if not email us again at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com.
Thank you and best regards.

author: Peter Giordano
comment: Garbage app. Half the faces don't work well.  Save your money

reply.content: Hello Peter. Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If the watchfaces are not applying you must double check your connection status. Also please email us the list of watchfaces causing issues to ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. We will investigate and update them if the issues are found. Please get back to us. Thank you.

author: Saahir Kapasi
comment: Hey, the watch battery doesn't seem to work on any watch face. The phone battery updates but my watch shows 95% when it's actually at 20%

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello Saahir. Thank you for the feedback. Please email us screenshot of which watchface is causing this issue also check if other watchfaces are causing the same issue. Because from our devices, the indicator seems to be working without an issue.  Please email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com with details.

comment: Edited: problens solved, thanks Dear watchmaster: I'm having some issues with the app and my new galaxy note 8... I don't know why but the app does not appear anymore on my watch and the link provided when I open the app on my phone goes to galaxy apps app that shows that the app is already installed ... what can I do? Ps: my watch is LG urbane  The best app for wear, worth subscribing

author: David Clarkson
comment: I want to give this more stars. But I cannot get the app to apply the watchface. Maybe it's a Pro feature? I think I should be able to apply a free watchface to evaluate if I want to drop the money for Pro or not... Asus Zenwatch 3.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello David. 
Thank you for the feedback. Android wear 2.0 users must download WatchMaster again on their watch. If you go to settings please tap Install WatchMaster from Watch. This will send a link to your watch for download. If the applying is still not working after the download email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. Thanks.

author: Alan Webster
comment: I had some issues with subscription upgrades when moving to a new device, this has been resolved by the team. Great value for money. Well worth paying for the pro version.

author: Mohammad Shafik
comment: Tizen 3.0 on my Gear S3 has broken Watch Master. When do you expect to be back and working? I have the full version.

reply.content:

Please update your WatchMaster for Gear S2 and 3 to WatchMaster for Tizen.

author: Albert Rinaldi
comment: Already not using it for more than 5 months because i sold my smartwatches. But i forgot to delete the auto-subscription so it auto-withdraw my token from my prepaid cellphone provider. I feel like being scammed right now

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Albert. 
Thank you for the feedback. If you are not using WatchMaster make sure to deactivate the subscription, or else it's going to automatically charge you a year later. This information is written on our Help section. Hope this helped, if not email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. Thanks.

author: Joseph Ilardi
comment: I like this app, but since the update it no longer works on my 3G gear S2. It keep freezing my watch and not displaying a watch face.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Joseph. 
Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience.  Please delete and reinstall the WatchMaster app on both phone & watch. If this doesn't help email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. 
Thank you and best regards.

author: William Aung Leyraud
comment: Last update crashed the app, can't use my watchfaces.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello William. Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. In order to help solve this issue we need more information on the how the issue occurred. Also detail outline of what kind of device you are currently using. Please email us back with the informations and screenshots. (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com) Thank you.

comment: I haven't gotten it to work on my gear s2

This is a companion app for WatchMaster Gear users. The instructions of how to set up your Gear is on our 'Help' Section. If you need help email us!
Thank you.

comment: Updated to use with S3, no longer connects to phone. When uninstalled, watch would connect to Bluetooth again.

Please check out the Help section for how to install the WatchMaster properly. If you need help email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com. 
Thank you.

comment: WHY WAS YOUR GEAR S3 COMPANION APP REMOVED FROM THE GALAXY STORE IN THE US??
